descript.abstract: The Mapunit Text table contains notes and narrative descriptions related to the referenced map unit.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: A non-connotative string of characters used to uniquely identify a record in the Mapunit Text table.
The actual narrative text portion of a text entry. The other parts of a text entry are its identifiers: kind, category and subcategory.
The unique identifier of a record in the Mapunit table. Use this column to join the Mapunit Text table to the Mapunit table.

A text entry is identified by its kind, category, and subcategory. Subcategory is a subdivision of category. For text kind "Nontechnical" description and text category "Agr", subcategory would correspond to the SSSD field "desnum".
The date associated with a particular record, expressed as month, day, year -- xx/xx/xxxx.
Text kind provides a grouping of text entries according to their subject matter. For example, the text kind "edit notes" groups text entries that deal with adding or changing data.
A text entry is identified by its kind, category, and subcategory. Category is a subdivision of kind. "Agr" and "Soi" are two categories for the text kind "Nontechnical Description".

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
